mapper.insert: insert into tb_discount_rule ( discount_id, expend_amount, discount1, discount2, ctime ) values ( #{discountId}, #{expendAmount}, #{discount1}, #{discount2}, #{ctime} )
mapper.select: select dr.id, dr.discount_id discountId, dr.expend_amount expendAmount, dr.discount1, dr.discount2, dr.ctime from tb_discount_rule dr where dr.discount_id = #{discountId}
